extendedInfo.description: Blur your face from candid photos with a single tap!Hide any part of photo behind wide pixels wall!Share updated photos with your friends!App Features:- Take photo from camera or picture gallery;- Tap photo to blur selected area;- Zoom on double tap;  - Share updated photos via email, mms and etc. - Save updated photos in picture gallery;- Customize blur size;- Undo/redo changes;Notice: If you have found any issues with the app, PLEASE EMAIL ME! That will help me make app better :)

reviews.title: Do not download!
reviews.comment: The app works fine. But my phone was swimming in random apps that I didn\'t add myself because of this app. I was also getting advertisments in my notifications. Just do not get this app at al. I\'m uninstalling now.
reviews.author: Anisa El-Khouri

reviews.title: SPAM! SPAM! SPAM!
reviews.comment: I loved the app. But, the spam and pop up apps are a buzz kill.
reviews.author: Nina Wheeler

reviews.title: No thanks!
reviews.comment: It worked however it continually loads garbage and spam apps onto my phone! Thanks but no thanks...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it !
reviews.comment: The exact app I was looking for ! It just forcloses a lot please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beware!
reviews.comment: Works fine for what it does but it installs all kinds of other apps & ads now randomly pop up on my phone.  Uninstalling
reviews.author: Jessie Stefanescu

reviews.title: Spam!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Gonna delete this crap!!!!I\'m deleting apps on my homescreen almost every day.. spam is getting worst and worst.  DO NOT DOWNLOAD......
reviews.author: Richie Chi

reviews.title: Too much spam
reviews.comment: The app is alright, but it\'s completely unacceptable to be putting random icons on my screen and sending airpush ads. Pathetic.
reviews.author: David Donnelly

reviews.title: Galaxy S
reviews.comment: Great app for a small sized app. Luv it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I could not believe I would get such an awesome app just for free! I\'m grateful. This is flawless.
reviews.author: Nance Polk

reviews.title: DO NOT INSTALL!!
reviews.comment: App adds shortcuts to ads on your desktop and spams your notification bar. Developers like this should be dragged into the street and SHOT.
reviews.author: Christian Brigham

reviews.title: App works perfect, but way to many ads
reviews.comment: Every 24 hour period I had a random shortcut on my home screen. And two notifications in the same period. Guess what if you don\'t delete them they will pile up. Mostly on a secondary home screen. Way too sneaky for me. That coupled with all the permissions needed causes me to uninstall. I\'ll never download anything from this dev again -1. FYI I would of paid between $1-$5 bucks because it works so well.
reviews.author: Juan Lopez

reviews.title: Very neat
reviews.comment: In some sensitive cases i don\'t want to show my faces in pics. This\'s good.
reviews.author: Randus Cjaken

reviews.title: SPAM!!
reviews.comment: This app was good for me to use it once to make a photo to post but I had to uninstall it due to consant popup ads. If your going to get this for one time use its fine but uninstall it later or you\'ll want to jump off a cliff the ads will get so annoying.
reviews.author: Nate Marx

reviews.title: SPAM
reviews.comment: Installs other apps without your permission! And not even a good editing program.
reviews.author: Tadpole Jackson

reviews.title: Spams apps and drops photos in temp folder
reviews.comment: Decent app for what it does but its really annoying when it spams apps on your phone and drops randomly edited photos into your temp photo folder.  Uninstalling will re install on a need basis.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Malware
reviews.comment: Adds spam apps and ads. Barely works anyway.
reviews.author: EJ Radcliff

reviews.title: Dont install
reviews.comment: Spams you with notifications. Adds links to rubbish on your home screen.
reviews.author: Tom Nicholls

reviews.title: SPAM! SPAM! SPAM!
reviews.comment: Constantly runs pop up ads and uninvited apps to phone. Awful feature for a great, simple app.
reviews.author: Brendan M Smith

reviews.title: Can\'t stand the notification bar ads
reviews.comment: I haven\'t even used this app yet, but it\'s always flashing my LED and giving me ads in my notification bar!
reviews.author: Adam Charles
